guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

body: Men worshipping women is as much a traditionalist desire as a feminist one. It manifests different but all ultimately comes down to male expendability and worthlessness and females being sacred, innocent beings. Which is unsurprising, because due to the way reproduction works (one man can get thousands of women pregnant) caring about a woman exponentially more than a man is a hardwired instinct. The male body and brain are also designed to perform for their clan whereas the female one retains its natural state aside from reproductive capabilities; and socially, all they're expected to do is have babies. And even if they don't or can't, people will still assume they are or will and don't require them to prove their loyalty to gain love and respect. Basically males are flesh machine slaves for society and our lives suck, but that doesn't matter because only female individual lives and self-actualization are valuable.

post.body: The only time the warm side isn't better is in extremely warm climates. Needing to get out of bed for something and coming back to a nice, warm, comfy pillow is one of the best things on earth. I have never understood the cool side of the pillow thing. I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.

post.body:
Hear me out, I’m not sure if this opinion is unpopular **on Ruqqus**, but it is pretty much everywhere.

It may seem that USA is free speech because it has the first amendment and stuff. However, the first amendment is actually very weak. The US government does discreet censorship. The pentagon does their own censorship (in military movies, they cover up soldier suicides).

Not only that, the big tech corporations censoring “misinformation” are actually puppets of the government. US government officials will tell the CEOs of these big tech corporations to censor information against their agenda (masks don’t work, etc) and they of course comply. It isn’t the corporations independent choice. I cannot find a source for this but I saw something on Reclaim the Net.

As long as the government engages in secret censorship, I cannot call USA a free speech country.
post.body_html:
Hear me out, I’m not sure if this opinion is unpopular on Ruqqus, but it is pretty much everywhere.

It may seem that USA is free speech because it has the first amendment and stuff. However, the first amendment is actually very weak. The US government does discreet censorship. The pentagon does their own censorship (in military movies, they cover up soldier suicides).

Not only that, the big tech corporations censoring “misinformation” are actually puppets of the government. US government officials will tell the CEOs of these big tech corporations to censor information against their agenda (masks don’t work, etc) and they of course comply. It isn’t the corporations independent choice. I cannot find a source for this but I saw something on Reclaim the Net.

As long as the government engages in secret censorship, I cannot call USA a free speech country.
post.title: USA is not as free speech as it seems to be

body:
Probably because both the male body and society are against it. Women are given much more leeway to forge their own path and achieve self-actualization, because their only real duty is to have babies. Men are expected to achieve things and prove their loyalty and worth through actions. Their body and mind develops uniquely to excel in those societal roles, meaning they lose all their other skills, which could be the ones they actually wanted. The only thing that holds men back from offing themselves is their sense of pride in their social duty. And sometimes that doesn't activate, which happened to me, and all I can do is wallow in horror at how worthless I am and how pointless and painful the rest of my life is going to be having unwillingly sacrificed everything good I had to be better at slaving for a society I hate anyway.

I'm not a MGTOW but I can see how suffering this crap 24/7 with no hope of it ever ending could make someone resent women out of envy.

body: I can easily ignore other people, what I cannot ignore is my brain that has thrown out everything except the functions to perform at these exact things. And my body too to a lesser extent. So when I want to make things, I cannot because my brain has converted my creativity to spatial skills. I cannot feel emotions other than anger hardly at all because my brain switched to worker/warrior mode. I can't see colors as vibrantly because my eyes have devoted more resources to sensing movement and seeing in the dark. I can't think clearly. I can't write or speak as well. I can't be a kind and rational person unless I try really hard, whereas to women and former me it came easily. I can't really do anything I want to do because all my brain has erased it to improve at other things I don't want to do. I literally *can't*. The social expectations are merely an extra burden on top of all of this. And how the rest of my half of the world actually *likes* this is a supreme mystery. Sorry for the poor wording but as I said, I can't do any better.
body_html: I can easily ignore other people, what I cannot ignore is my brain that has thrown out everything except the functions to perform at these exact things. And my body too to a lesser extent. So when I want to make things, I cannot because my brain has converted my creativity to spatial skills. I cannot feel emotions other than anger hardly at all because my brain switched to worker/warrior mode. I can't see colors as vibrantly because my eyes have devoted more resources to sensing movement and seeing in the dark. I can't think clearly. I can't write or speak as well. I can't be a kind and rational person unless I try really hard, whereas to women and former me it came easily. I can't really do anything I want to do because all my brain has erased it to improve at other things I don't want to do. I literally can't. The social expectations are merely an extra burden on top of all of this. And how the rest of my half of the world actually likes this is a supreme mystery. Sorry for the poor wording but as I said, I can't do any better.

post.body: The only time the warm side isn't better is in extremely warm climates. Needing to get out of bed for something and coming back to a nice, warm, comfy pillow is one of the best things on earth. I have never understood the cool side of the pillow thing. I'll flip my pillow to get a different corner or side for my head but then I've gotta wait for it to warm up again.

post.title: The warm side of the pillow is superior in every way.
